AI Description: The r-tibble package in R provides a modern data frame implementation that handles data in a structured tabular format, enhancing data manipulation capabilities for data analysis and statistical computing.
Core Features: 1. Provides a modern and efficient data frame structure for data management. 2. Offers enhanced data manipulation functions. 3. Supports streamlined data analysis workflows. 4. Facilitates seamless integration with other R packages.
General Tags: R, Data Frame, Data Analysis, Data Manipulation
